name: Kampania Wrzesniowa
overview: Kampania wrześniowa (September Campaign) takes place during the invasion of Poland in 1939, marking the beginning of the World War 2. The goal is to capture enemy headquarters. The game is played in turns (4 phases: movement and attack for Poles and Germans, respectively). The player commands infantry, cavalry, tank, armored car and artillery units (both sides available for play). Bad weather hampers movement. The map also contains minefields.
